section.title: Description
section.p: Identifies contiguous growth (extension) of the primary tumor within the organ of origin or its direct extension into neighboring organs. Possible values are Not applicable; Further contiguous extension; No evidence of primary tumor; Unknown extension; primary tumor cannot be assessed; not stated in patient record; etc.

stentry.p: Identifies contiguous growth (extension) of the primary tumor within the organ of origin or its direct extension into neighboring organs. Possible values are Not applicable; Further contiguous extension; No evidence of primary tumor; Unknown extension; primary tumor cannot be assessed; not stated in patient record; etc.
